Package com.paypal.selion.grid

This package hosts the the main startup class(es) for SeLion-Grid.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LauncherOptions
    These options give a programmatic way to influence some of the behaviors of a RunnableLauncher.
    ProcessLauncherOptions
    LauncherOptions which apply to RunnableLaunchers which spawn a new process
    RunnableLauncher
    Interface which extends Runnable and adds some additional methods
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IOSDriverJarSpawner
    A MobileProcessLauncher for ios-driver stand alone.
    JarSpawner
    This is a stand alone class which sets up SeLion dependencies and spawns SeLionGridLauncherV3.
    LauncherConfiguration
    SeLion Grid configuration options that influence some of the behaviors of a RunnableLauncher.
    ProcessLauncherConfiguration
    SeLion Grid process configuration options which are shared across all RunnableLaunchers which spawn a new process, usually a Java one.
    SelendroidJarSpawner
    A MobileProcessLauncher for Selendroid stand alone.
    SeLionGridConfiguration
    SeLion grid configuration options which are common to both hubs and nodes
    SeLionGridHubConfiguration
    An extension of SeLionGridConfiguration for the "hub" which includes SeLion Grid ProcessLauncherConfiguration configuration, and Selenium GridHubConfiguration configuration
    SeLionGridLauncherV3
    The SeLion version of the GridLauncherV3.
    SeLionGridNodeConfiguration
    An extension of SeLionGridConfiguration for "nodes" which includes SeLion Grid ProcessLauncherConfiguration configuration, and Selenium GridNodeConfiguration configuration
    SeLionStandaloneConfiguration
    SeLion Grid "standalone" configuration which includes SeLion Grid ProcessLauncherConfiguration configuration, and Selenium StandaloneConfiguration configuration
    ThreadedLauncher
    A RunnableLauncher for SeLion Grid.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RunnableLauncher.InstanceType
    Maps to a type of WebDriver instance.

Package com.paypal.selion.grid Description

This package hosts the the main startup class(es) for SeLion-Grid.
